Package com.miage.vehicle_sales_management.controller

Class CatalogController

java.lang.Object
com.miage.vehicle_sales_management.controller.CatalogController
@Controller @SessionAttributes("user") public class CatalogController extends Object
Controller related to the catalog management

  • Method Details

    • catalog

      @RequestMapping(value="/catalog", method={GET,POST}) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView catalog(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mv)
      Show the catalog page of the website with all the vehicles available
      Parameters:
      mv - ModelAndView of the page
      Returns:
      mv ModelAndView with the page catalog.jsp

    • management

      @RequestMapping(value="/management", method=POST) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView management(@RequestParam("action") String action, @RequestParam("quantity[]") int[] quantities, @RequestParam("checkbox[]") int[] checkboxes, org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mv)
      Manage the cars available in the catalog If the action is delete, calling the model to delete the car in the database If the action is cart, return the page to cart.jsp with all the cars in the cart
      Parameters:
      action - The action to do
      quantities - Vehicles quantities array
      checkboxes - Vehicles id array
      mv - ModelAndView of the page
      Returns:
      mv ModelAndView with the page catalog.jsp or cart.jsp

    • cart

      @RequestMapping(value="/cart", method={GET,POST}) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView cart(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mv)
      Show the cart page with all the vehicles in the cart
      Parameters:
      mv - ModelAndView of the page
      Returns:
      mv ModelAndView with the page cart.jsp

    • clearCart

      @RequestMapping(value="/clear-cart", method=POST) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView clearCart(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mv)
      Clear the cart of the user
      Parameters:
      mv - ModelAndView of the page
      Returns:
      mv ModelAndView with the page cart.jsp

    • search

      @RequestMapping(value="/search", method=POST) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView search(@RequestParam("search") String search, org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mv)
      Filter the catalog with the user input from the search bar
      Parameters:
      search - Search input given by the user
      mv - ModelAndView of the page
      Returns:
      mv ModelAndView with the page catalog.jsp

    • invoice

      @RequestMapping(value="/invoice", method={GET,POST}) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView invoice(@RequestParam("quantity[]") int[] quantities, @RequestParam("checkbox[]") int[] checkboxes, org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mv)
      Create a new invoice with the vehicles in the cart If the invoice is successfully generated, return the page invoice.jsp with the invoice details If the invoice is not generated, return the page cart.jsp with the error message
      Parameters:
      quantities - Vehicles quantities array
      checkboxes - Vehicles id array
      mv - ModelAndView of the page
      Returns:
      mv ModelAndView with the page invoice.jsp or cart.jsp

    • invoiceManagement

      @RequestMapping(value="/invoice-management", method=POST) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView invoiceManagement(@RequestParam("payment") String payment, org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView mv)
      Set the invoice payment information and call the model to insert the invoice in the database
      Parameters:
      payment - The payment method chosen by the user
      mv - ModelAndView of the page
      Returns:
      mv ModelAndView with the page invoice.jsp
